hymn.title: Grace there is my every debt to pay
hymn.chords: | C - - - | G - G/D - | G7 - G7/B - | C - C/G - | C - F/C - | C - C/E F | C/G - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: Grace there is my ev -- ery debt to pay, Blood to wash my ev -- ery sin a -- way, Pow'r to keep me spot -- less day by day, In Christ for me.

hymn.copyright: Used by permission of The Salvation Army Musical Board.

lyrics.stanza: Grace there is my every debt to pay, Blood to wash my every sin away, Pow'r to keep me spotless day by day, In Christ for me.
